lang.name_field_empty: The name field is empty. Please specify a name.
lang.name_field_duplicate: Another task in the database is using the same name. Please specify another name.
lang.invalid_table_name: Name must start with a letter or "_" and contain letters, digits, or "_".
lang.table_name_duplicate: The table name is already in use. Please specify another table name.
lang.what_task_type: What type of task would you like to add?
lang.what_sensor_name_and_group: Specify the sensor name and group
lang.what_task_name_and_group: Specify the task name and group
lang.type_error: There are some problems in the new task setup process. Please cancel and restart the new task setup process
lang.ph_group_error: Failed to retrieve group choices from PH_GROUP table. Please make sure PH_GROUP and SYSADMIN database is working properly.
lang.task_desc: Provide description for the new task.
lang.sensor_desc: Provide description for the new sensor.
lang.what_sensor_schedule: Specify the schedule for the new sensor.
lang.what_task_schedule: Specify the schedule for the new task.
lang.what_result_table: Specify the name of a new result table in which to store the sensor data results.
lang.what_tk_create: Complete the SQL statement to create the result table by entering the column names of the result table.
lang.what_sensor_tk_execute: Specify the command that the new sensor should run.
lang.what_task_tk_execute: Specify the command that the new task should run.
lang.custom_sql: Enter a single statement SQL command or user-defined function.
lang.stored_routine_error: Failed to retrieve stored routines. Please fix SYSPROCEDURES table if you want to use stored routines.
lang.verify_specs_sensor: Verify the following specifics for the sensor you want to create. Click Finish to confirm and create the sensor.
lang.verify_specs_task: Verify the following specifics for the task you want to create. Click Finish to confirm and create the task.
lang.name: Name
lang.task_name_check_error: Failed to validate if the task name is currently used. Please check the ph_task table in the sysadmin database.
lang.table_name_check_error: Failed to validate if the table name is currently used. Please check the systables table in the sysadmin database
lang.sensor_check_ok: The new sensor has been scheduled successfully.
lang.sensor_check_failed: The new sensor setup is not successful. Please run the setup again
lang.sensor_check_bad_exec: The sensor will run according to schedule but there are some problems with the command.
lang.debug_exec_stmt: Please check the following error code. Click on the link to debug the command.
lang.task_check_ok: The new task has been scheduled successfully.
lang.task_check_failed: The new task setup is not successful. Please run the setup again
lang.task_check_bad_exec: The task will run according to schedule but there are some problems with the command.
lang.time_error: The stop time cannot be earlier than the start time.
lang.freq_error: The frequency cannot be 0 days, 0 hours, 0 minutes, 0 seconds
lang.execute_stmt_empty: The execution statement cannot be empty.
lang.create_stmt_empty: The create statement cannot be empty.
lang.NoPermission: Read-only users do not have permission to do this. You are logged in as a read-only user.
lang.NoExecutionStmt: The execution statement for a task cannot be empty.
lang.ResultTableDeleteFailed: Failed to delete the result table
lang.TaskDeleteSuccessful: The task has been deleted successfully
lang.DeleteUnavailable: Delete is not allowed for system tasks
lang.FeatureUnavailable: This feature is not available for your current server version.
